article.title: Olson Assigned PEO Post at AFMC
article.author: Beverly Schaeffer

tags.tag: Air Force Life Cycle Management Center

article.text: Maj. Gen. Craig S. Olson, USAF, has been nominated for assignment as program executive officer, command, control and communications information and networks, Air Force Life Cycle Management Center, Air Force Materiel Command, Hanscom Air Force Base, Massachusetts.
